ARABIC: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَآ إِذًا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'At the time I did it I was one of the misguided
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Moses) replied: "I did do that and I was in the wrong,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses replied: "I committed that act erringly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses said, "I did do it and I made a mistake.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Moosa, “I did that at a time when I was unaware of the consequences.” (In anger – See verse 28:15)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Musa said: "I did it then, when I was in error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: I did it then while I was of those unable to see the right course;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'Indeed I did it then, being one of those that stray;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: I did it then, when I was of those who are astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses replied, "I did that when I was one of the misguided,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: I did it then when I was mistaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘I did that when I was astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Moses said: "I did it then, when I was in error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Musa (Moses) said: "I did it then, when I was an ignorant (as regards my Lord and His Message).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Moses) replied: 'Indeed, I did that when I was among those who stray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “I did it then, when I was of those astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Moses] said, "I did it, then, while I was of those astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:20] He, Moses, said, ‘I did that then, when I was astray, from the knowledge and the Message which God would later give me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Moses said: (I did it then, when I was of those who are astray) when I was ungrateful for your kindness.
